text:
It may be nice for debugging, but not for security; input and overrides often
hide security info, and I dont want that appearing in logs. 

Maybe this should be logged at the -v level.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
I'm not sure what we should do here. I like debug info, but dont like exposing
sensitive data to the log. I am not above combining input with property files
kept in a secure dir, and make a point of not printing the pass keys out. 

given you can always print the value with an <echo> before/after the input task,
I think we could mark this as wontfix for security reasons.

as said before: WONTFIX for security reasons
Workaround: <echo> on verbose level
